items.title: Money Matters| How to save Rs 1 cr in 10 years,: Check how much you need to invest every month
items.description:
Path to becoming a crorepati? Owning Rs 1 crore is an investor's dream. Strategic investments, like SIPs in equity funds, can help reach that goal. Regular investing and a long-term view are crucial. Even a Rs 1,000 SIP can grow substantially over time, thanks to compounding. Disciplined investing is key to turning your crorepati dream into reality. Here is how to accumulate Rs 1 crore from mutual fund SIPs in 10 years, 15 years, 20 years and 25 years.
#sip #personalfinance #equityfunds #compounding #investment
